"Welcome to Timed Toggles. If this device is rooted, please go to 'Settings' and tick the Rooted Device option and grant full permissions in order to enable more toggles. To get started click the + icon to add your first timed toggle.
Please note the airplane toggling only works on rooted devices if running Android 4.2 or newer due to a Google restriction.
Sometimes Timed Toggles will be upgraded via the Play Store, if you are alerted that the app has been upgraded please run it at least once to ensure the upgrade is completed and if applicable re-apply root permissions."
